Name: Obituary
Ingredients: 60 ml Hayman's London Dry Gin from freezer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare Fragata Green Olive for garnish.
Review: What a way to go. A Dry Martini with a dash of the green fairy .
History: This absinthe-laced Dry Martini was popularised during the 1940s at Lafitte's Blacksmith Shop in New Orleans and is regarded as one of the Crescent City's cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Obituary contains 151 calories
